1eqyqJqADcQH3N7rsrDOfA.text: Literally no queso in my to go order again. Everytime. Never fails. Not only this location either! I order carne asada fries and they forget my queso every single time.  I guess I should do my due diligence as a customer and check the bag before I go, but I unfortunately have trust in my eating establishments. I also got a container full of shrimp with burnt on flat top gunk. I need to stop coming here. Smh.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

ui4obduBVgqLdQrqlcsd8w.text: First thing I must say is coming from Dominican background I never seen a Dominican burrito before until I came to this place. Is called "El Dominicano" is pretty much a chimichurri but instead of bread they use a tortilla ?? LOL  but overall this place has great flavorful food for a good price Sunday's is half off domestic beers. Y'all have  try the pineapple habanero sauce is a amazing very spicy tho  ! Is just one of the many sauces to choose Fromm so well . Ive been here many times and I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for my burrito falling apart everytime I order one.

e2DFc0AqnVjXPycuxdjR4g.text: Excellent customer service! Great food and friendly faces.  Highly recommend this location to anyone!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Taco salad with steak! So Delicious!!!! Highly recommend the taco salad.

zEcNpwJGU88CwC_2-hTq4w.text: Update: tried to get 3 veggie tacos to go tonight and was told it would be a 40 minute wait.... really?

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. $1 Taco Tuesday Togo

Ra-wZnhxdZfdYQJo8PoFMw.text: SO YUMMY! This tastes like street food, so it's a little greasy, but it easily beats out all the popular chain Mexican places.  I've had a burrito, an empanada, a quesadilla, and churros (all on separate occasions) and have nothing to complain about.

JwYgzfkN4Mp8xiTYS60_qw.text: I waited until I visited this location a couple of times before writing this review. The first trip I had the Nachos Supreme, which is the best deal on the menu. You receive a huge pile of chips and toppings that are delicious!   Unfortunately, our second trip was not quite as good. We went for Taco Tuesday and tried a total of six different tacos. Five of the tacos were completely without flavor and bland. The sixth was chorizo, which the Mrs. took one bite of and put down. I guess if the goal is to cover the tacos in a variety of available salsas, then you may be okay.   The final issue is that you will smell like the restaurant for the rest of the day. I guess than can be considered good or bad depending on your preference.   We will return if we really, really are in the mood for nachos.

J649ee7qsu8QB5bUKmDi4g.text: Why did I not try Sabor sooner? Happened by for lunch on Saturday & it was excellent! Had a pulled chicken bowl (enough for a 2nd meal the next day). Pineville is out of my normal territory, but I'll be trying out the Elizabeth location soon.

jbh1Jl9BOIXOa_rgI6f6yA.text: Omg this place is great for dollar taco Tuesdays and mojito Thursdays! The nachos are the best I've ever had & they fill my fiance & I both up with one serving. Don't forget the queso dip because it's addicting!!! Staff is friendly & atmosphere is comphy; wish there were more up north!

B-9g7lBkEfM8G713MLmjKQ.text: Sabor is great. They have a good variety of modern latin food. There are a few locations around the Charlotte area, the one in Indian Trail and the one up by the Novant hospital (formerly Presby main) are both better than this Pineville location as far as cleanliness and service but the food has been consistently great at all of them. They have a good selection of beverages including domestic and imported beers and basic mixed drinks (mojitos, margaritas, etc.). The sauces are really good as well but the food is already flavorful so you may find them unnecessary. I especially like that they have outlets with USB plug in at each table and booth and it's that kind of extra thought that brings me to 5 stars rather than just 4. I definitely recommend trying whichever Sabor is closest to you as soon as possible.

gXxmViRwoVZ8-4F6wKgGkw.text: Honestly I expected a lot more from this restaurant due to rave reviews of the others in the area. I ordered a burrito with steak and the quinoa brown rice. It was obvious the steak wasn't super fresh; it was kind of cold. The burrito, although super large, didn't have too much flavor and the quinoa brown rice was pretty unappetizing. The dining area was pretty dirty too, tables had food all over them and hadn't been cleaned for a while. I would  give this another try and order something different but until then the 2 stars stands.

DY7itnZNTEEea4gBsayQKQ.text: Food is consistently delicious. You can get delivery via Uber Eats or order online and pick up yourself. The tacos are simple and delicious. The carne asada fries are amazing. The nachos are so good but huge (enough food for four people) and they have the BEST tortilla chips. Specials on food and drinks everyday. If you are looking for tasty and consistent Mexican food definitely stop here.

MUDgC7od8FMP4yL9rKClug.text: This is an amazing authentic Latin grill. This isn't Tex Mex taco Bell, Chili's, on the border crap. So if you're looking for the mundane and normal.... Skip this fantastic spot. However if you want fresh, flavor, culture, and a great margarita this is THE SPOT. They offer daily specials, like taco Tuesday, where authentic tacos are only one dollar. Also if you're dining in and want a change, place an order through Uber eats... They'll deliver it right to your door. I recommend the nachos with shredded chicken. Enjoy!

488MijKEHVsY5NJtnBwjSA.text: Food is amazing and great location! Love how much more space this one has. Will be back soon!

JTRiyjSHxvkWFfvgReGhyg.text: I've been to the Sabor on South Tryon numerous times and I've always loved the friendly environment. Even at their super busy times the food is always great and the staff is nice. This location is not the same. The wait times are ridiculous and the staff treats people like inconveniences. I've been 3 times now for to go orders and my food was good 1 out of 3 times. I'd rather drive to the other side of town than come back here.

zY7boHVxFklk1Jdphzw_Tw.text: I stopped by yesterday and ordered the Arepa.  It was fantastic!!!  I had the opportunity to meet Angela and Jeremy, who were so welcoming and gave me the exciting news that a location will be coming near me in Huntersville.  I love Latin food and this place is so authentic.  The decor was colorful and the menu was descriptive and easy to understand.  I will definitely be returning to try everything else on the menu.  Keep up the good work and see you all soon!  Ray Clark

EwhI3dx_jPKim7J0opaARg.text: love it! food is great. everything on the  menu looked appetizing. service was good.. will be returning soon.

88o1Xb0wxoDzvfDZlub_5g.text: Visited for the first time on Taco Tuesday this week. Ordered chicken and ground beef $1 street tacos which were served hot, however taste was average. Also ordered the nachos with steak which had an upcharge for the protein. Nachos were fresh, however the portion of queso and steak were a bit skimpy. Value would be greatly diminished on non-taco Tuesday day. Employees were friendly and helpful.

yBsdiKpV1TjJQ3i8YPvznQ.text: I LOVE this Sabor! It's very clean, the employees are friendly and helpful, and the food comes out fast and it's always delicious! I don't live close to this side of town but whenever I'm out here this place is always my first choice.

XrU3Q7c-i7Kdab9hYSko0w.text: We've visited this location several times and always had a great experience. Location is nice and clean, has outdoor seating and service is always great. They also have good daily specials. Salsa bar is a must try! The Carne Asada Fries are delicious and highly recommended! We also tried the Empanada and Arepa which were very good. Everything is made to order so its easy to customize each item and...fresh!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Carne Asada Fries w/ Black Beans
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Carne Asada Fries
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Carne Asada Fries and Chips &amp; Salsas

86Tlwj9YPuDvSoqf_SmSdw.text: This place is great . Fresh ingredients . Wide selection . Huge portions . Will definitely return .

J_-uaAnfKeUm0zPgZKM2cw.text: This is such a great "fast food" restaurant.  Walk up and order and the food is out to your table within 5 minutes.  Some of the best nachos in town!  Their ingredients are always fresh and delicious.  Last time I went in on a Tuesday, they had $1 tacos!  Great deal.

oZ_2yxov2AjAZsHC_Ey-HA.text: This food is just awful. I had it delivered via Door Dash and could not believe the comedy of errors this food was. My order was missing items. The food was tasteless. I won't bother them again.

dQHOGzmVEfY4BKGpaenzLw.text: YES!  Finally some authentic Mexican tacos.  Got the Al Pastor, Asada, and Barbacoa, platanos maduros (not Mexican but hey I'm not arguing), and the Elote Loco (mexican style corn with chili powder and mayo). Beers were $2.50 each. Highly recommend.  Super friendly staff.  Great experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Dominant taco game. Street tacos on point!

kji86Ea76yU26xh2tnVXIQ.text: This spot just opened near my work! Of course, my coworkers and I got some $1 tacos! They were good, but I found something wrong with the order. I called and spoke to the manager, I think it was Lee... but I honestly do not remember, he was very friendly and empathetic. He ended up refunding the tacos! He was exceptional!   I will go to a sabor again, but I'm just not sure if I'll go to this one.

TG5Ih1ubOkUB4X3vzSAx2A.text: Went on a Saturday afternoon. I asked for a pork burrito, but they didn't have any pork, so that was disappointing. I settled for a chicken burrito which was very tasty and filling, but I found the shredded chicken to be too shredded. It was almost non-existent.  I also ordered an empanada with cheese and chicken which was the best. It was a little hard to find a place to sit because the tables were dirty. Perhaps they were short staffed that day. The Mr. was still hungry after his fish taco and chorizo burrito. He wasn't as pleased as I was with the meal. I'd definitely return for the empanada.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Chicken burrito

eBCcNpRsZKr5zo-1MP6Buw.text: Popped in the other night to fill the Taco Craving Monster. I didn't realize this location was new - it was packed!! Super bonus is they have a website you can order from and just pick up straight from the counter. Yasss.. I love being able to order take out online!  Anyway, to the food. This place definitely hit the spot for the taco craving. I'm not talking about the hard shell corn tacos, either. This is the real deal with the super thin doubled-up soft tortillas with a variety of choices to top with. I recommend the pork, and I think I even saw tongue on the menu. Will have to try that next time. Also, they have yucca fries. YUM to yucca always.   Don't forget to stop at the salsa bar for a variety of salsa choices, ranging from fruity to mild to holy fireballs.   Recommend!

yCxFE6HpFsKERQFaUzERqQ.text: I've driven by here a few times and it always seemed busy, so today I stopped in to check it out. I ordered 2 Americanos taco, one shredded and one grilled steak. Relatively inexpensive. After a 20-25 mins I finally got my go-to order and left. The steak in the grilled steak tacos was really chewy(like a piece of gum) and didnt have a flavor to it. The shredded chicken was much better until I almost choked on a small bone still in the chicken.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

PWXi6_y38RZtoX1O25ORiQ.text: This place was good because accommodated us asking for "puffy shells" which are fried flour shells. They tried it for us and they were amazing (see photo). Street corn was creamy and came right off the cob. They have a large variety of salsas at the salsa bar. #glcbeepbeep #queenbun #messybunforthewin

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. They fried the taco shells for us!

JxaoH3V5zGT-OF7rOb0JsQ.text: I always enjoy visiting this Sabor location.  They make the best drinks.  I've been to the other Sabor's in the area and the margs aren't as good.  Of course, the food is great!

T08KURRGBg3fTqv4KwxZFw.text: After a few more visits, they have gotten my order wrong three times I have been here since the review. Due to my severe allergies, that's unacceptable. I will not be returning to this location ever again.

jxUwtZ5ewXPQsfGCfgC7Ug.text: Yum. I've been wanting to try Sabor for quite some time now and I'm glad it's at a closer location. First time I came here I ordered the nachos with steak. It was very good and filling. Loaded with toppings but not a lot of meat. I can't complain because most of the chips were covered with something. Not to mention they also have a salsa bar!! Second time I came here I got the taco salad with chicken. We ordered our food and sat down. A family of 4 came after us. They got their food before us and I noticed one of them also had a taco salad. My husband got his food served but I still did not. I'm pretty sure my taco salad was served to the other family. We waited and waited and my husband finally had to go up there and ask them were my food was. They made it in a hurry so it was a little sloppy. I didn't mind too much but my husband's food was cold by the time I got mine. Overall, we would visit this place again. The prices are good and that salsa bar is on point.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Taco salad
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Chips
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Arepa

ApG9ymnPOCRdghHASiwRVw.text: Food was good but use cash only. I've tried burritos (better than Qdoba). However, they swipe cards using that SQ app, my card number got stolen. I strongly suspect it started happening with this place. SQ charges started appearing and I lost hundreds.

ElAq6Fx7g7yHkl-Nm3WVMQ.text: Excellent tacos!  This latest location confirms the fabulous taco takeover that Sabor had accomplished in Charlotte. I enjoyed the authenticos chicken tacos. They're meaty, juicy and delicious, plus add guacamole & chips and your mouth is happy!  Their menu also has lots of options for arepas or empanadas or nachos. I favor the tacos for a yummy yet affordable treat. They have Mexican Coca-cola and Fanta too. Their local brews are a great variety and there margaritas are excellent. This location is near the drive through Starbucks off 51 and includes a parking lot for easy access.

ikzOLA6hWxp3I8HGOOV0yg.text: Ordered chips and queso with ground beef. Got home and realized I didn't have any chips so I called and spoke with the manager Adon and told him what happened. He offered to bring me the chips and refunded me for my purchase. That's what I call awesome customer service!

sqwfgXE3zqvXxsIk1NYFvw.text: Good food and service were great. Hidden gem in South Charlotte near Carolina Place Mall.

tYT5aZyTtYrjyVenWgxyng.text: Bland bland bland! I was thoroughly unimpressed. Although the portions were huge, there was absolutely no flavor to the food- just bland chicken and cheese inside an overly fried shell.   I will not be returning

Yh1HbufqJkOLIUZ0oWiRyw.text: I love Sabor and was super excited to find one right near my home. This is a great spot to grab burritos and burrito bowls. Everything taste super fresh and their flavors are great. If I can't decide where to eat, this is definitely a go to spot. I typically go with a bowl and add everything to my liking. They also are on uber eats which is a plus. I'll be visiting often.

bqLxdtR4R3amsWsTc5UFxA.text: Flavors on carne asada fries were good but the meat was all tough and rubbery one piece was inedible.  I shouldn't have let the cashier talk me out of the chicken.  The woman next to me got nachos that looked amazing.  Next time I'll go with a burrito or nachos and avoid the carne asada.

v24Uu70YpjD61bVq-aaScw.text: Im writing this review as I finish my meal bc I'm extremely happy with this place. I've heard great things about Sabor and had the opportunity to try myself.  Staff was extremely friendly and helpful, since it was my first time here. I had the supreme nachos and maybe this was my only mistake.  This dish is HUGE! You can perfectly feed 4 people out of if, I'm not kidding. As I got it at my table my first reaction was to get a to go box because there's no way someone can eat all of it.   I got barbacoa with my nachos, and it was juicy and flavorful. Black Brand delicious, and the guacamole topping the plate is unbelievable!   It's my first time but I'll for sure come back to try theirs tacos and burritos. You should do the same!

lXylovY7uPDOL2tSD4_q8A.text: My family and I placed a catering order thru this location- Adon and the crew did a fabulous job with both the food and the service. We will gladly give them our business as much as possible! Food is fantastic!

HFmK8eu8hkxYxda-M_rJnA.text: We hadn't ordered from Sabor Latin Street Grill for a while so decided to stop by to nab dinner to go after a doctor's appointment close by. I hadn't set foot inside Sabor before as I'd call in an order & my husband would go pick it up. I'm not going to say the place gets 5 stars in the "decor category" as that's not what Sabor is about. It's painted a festive shade of red-orange, is CLEAN and has an open kitchen with a warm, lively & upbeat staff who is clearly happy to be working here and proud of the food they serve! Want to give a "shout out" to the delightful Brianna who took our order and to Rich who stood by when I asked to taste the mixer they used for their margaritas (which by the way is made FRESH -- not from a bottle)! The mix tasted great, just as fresh as they promised, so I told Rich who had prepared it earlier that he got an "A" for the day and ordered a margarita (the first I've ordered in years)! The entire staff deserved an "A"! We left with smiling faces and went home to a  yummy dinner with plenty of leftovers from our generously sized quesadilla & pulled chicken burrito.

0e3LysoKKSt4okDZViKieQ.text: My sister chose this restaurant for our lunch today. From now on, I'm letting her decide!! Or... we might just keep coming here every Tuesday. :)  Today, they had $1 tacos. I expected them to be mediocre due to the price. (I've been conned before by cheap food on "Taco Tuesday" at other restaurants!) But I was pleasantly surprised!! You can tell that they use real, fresh, and simple ingredients to make their amazing food!  You guys earned yourselves a new, loyal customer today!

s2DrNr9pmXIc6DeN8tHOYA.text: Finding a cool restaurant in a grocery store parking lot was a surprise. They advertise FRESH AUTHENTIC BOLD, and that is exactly what they delivered.  There is alcohol on the menu, which makes this more than a fast food joint.  There is also a kid's menu.   We ordered at the counter and our food was delivered within a matter of minutes.  Good service.   I had a taco salad with chicken and it was a good portion and tasty.  My lunch companion had a chicken burrito that could have fed a village.  We were trying to get on line to solve an issue with an app.   When I asked for the wi-if password, I was told that the wi-fi is only for management use.  In 2017, this is just not in keeping with the times.  There needs to be public wi-fi.  That has become the standard and expectation.  Overall, a good dining experience and I can understand why I see so many YELP check ins here.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

pJ2KfSDavtB3gmorr9oRAQ.text: We tried Sabor for dinner one weeknight, and it was great. I had the special for the night, an empanada and arepa combo. It was delicious and was plenty of food, almost too much. My husband got chips and a drink with his burrito, and the chips were enough for two people. Service was fairly quick. We'll be back!

jEGfNRXIMCeyRyv8S5erhw.text: This used to be my favorite Sabor to eat at but lately the service has went downhill. The past few times the disorganization and lack of work ethic has resulted in longer wait times and orders just sitting until someone brings them to the table. Sometimes getting cold before they make it to the patron. Tonight was no different. And instead of all hands on deck, there are two workers out having long conversations with the customers while the guys in the back are struggling with filling orders. In fact, one guy took a seat at a table while working and completely disregarded everything but the table in front of him. All while people sat waiting extremely long for their food.  I have begun frequenting this location less due to complete disregard like this. I understand having fun with the customers but letting your coworkers struggle is not something that should take a backseat.

nYOL89q38io3yoKzACVuhw.text: I came here and ordered the steak fries And I got to say the meat looked purple I believe it was fake meat And the guacamole was not real guacamole Probably some powder stuff I could not eat this The only good part was the fries

6pZiE54gVNXGVQ6wzDO9IA.text: Great food. I had the shredded chicken empanadas which was my favorite and a shredded chicken autenticos taco. The salsas were a bit spicy for me except the mild and verde.   Will be back on a Saturday with my husband as they have 1/2 price Craft beer.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

_93NiOHEr08HX7VKQ_d0LA.text: What a great new find to add to our workplace lunch rotation. Especially on Tuesdays for $1 (select) Taco Tuesday!  I had heard about Sabor from coworkers for quite some time. So, after this location near work opened up it was time to check it out. I also have one near my apartment in Fort Mill. hey seem to be popping up all over the CLT area.  A bit hesitant after an aforementioned coworker had a serious issue with a taco on the day they opened, (The management handled the situation with an apology and a refund.) I still went with a group of coworkers the next week. It was definitely a hot spot - especially on Tuesdays - so we knew it had to be good.  For the dollar taco deal you can choose from ground beef, veggie, black bean or shredded chicken. There are other taco options for two and three dollars with steak, etc. I had a coworker get ground beef, shredded chicken and steak and he ended up liking the ground beef and shredded chicken over the steak. [FWIW]  If you order a large queso, guac or pico they'll throw in a basket (more like a lundry basket) of free chippies for the dippies.   Staff is pretty friendly. I did notice on the first visit, the cleaning of tables after people left wasn't happening so some folks had to wipe up their own table. On the second visit, staff seemed to be out and about cleaning up the tables.  Oh yeah .. before I go ... GET THE LOCO STREET CORN! That is all.  adios

swTmoyChVrg0hMlIoCU5Jg.text: This is a Latin style fast food where you can get Arepa Venezuelan style street food along with Tacos, empanadas, and many other street food. Very unique yet decent and hybrid.

QYvJHluNswNXRAE5kQhgAw.text: This place is frustrating.  The food here is good most of the time. The arepas are my personal favorite!  But there are other times, where the steak is rock hard and over cooked or the chicken is hella salty.   The part that drives me crazy is ordering to go. They tell you to sit somewhere and they'll bring it to you. Dope! That sounds great. That's literally as far as it gets though. You just sit there while people who ordered after you get served at their tables. When you get tired of waiting you go up and find your food dying down behind the counter. This is not a one off occurrence, it has happened all three times we ordered to go and it's a heckin bummer man...  I want to like this place. Sometimes I really love this place. But man sometimes it's just sadness.

wkYtAobRA5mwbXbo7_R4AA.text: I actually like this location floor plan and extremely friendly staff. My family and I live South and usually frequent the Wesley Chapel location. I stumbled across this location while in Pineville getting my jewelry inspected at Jared's. I pulled up my handy dandy Yelp app as I was in a mood for a Black Bean Taco and this place popped up. I had no clue there was a location in Pineville.  The parking lot is sorta confusing as the lines at the entry don't appear to be for parking so I headed past the Sprint store to park properly in lines spaces. I walked back to the restaurant and upon entry I Loved the large open floor plan. As I smiled and looked around and headed to the register I had several voiced say "Welcome" and there were two registers with two friendly faces ready to take my order. I ended up with a Black Bean Authentico and a Grilled Veggie Americana Taco. I was pleased and extremely STUFFED after having those two tacos.  I think my super FAV part is the sauce bar and my FAV sauce is The Habenaro :-)   I didn't write my review until after my second visit and this past Tuesday I had a meeting in the area and decided to grab 1 Taco for a snack. However when I walked in it was TACO Tuesday $1 Authentico Tacos = SCORE so I ended up with 3 tacos 1 Black Bean and 2 Grilled Veggie. What threw me off is the fact that the tacos were way smaller than my first visit (5days prior) I brought that to the attention of one of the guys just as an inquiry. I was totally cool if it was due to it being Taco Tuesday & the fact that the tacos were only $1. The guy ensured me that the tacos are always the same size, fortunately for me I ALWAYS take pictures so I happily pulled up the photo from 5 days prior to show him and he was shocked and said that was a fluke. All in all when he brought out my 2nd order, as I was still hungry after the 3 small $1 tacos that I had to go back to order two more, he informed me that he added more to replicate my prior visit and ask to take pictures of the picture I had to show his manager to ensure they deliver.  I appreciated his efforts and acknowledgment of being consistent.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Taco Tuesday SCORE
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Salsa station
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. View from my window seat

tNeSxLXM91TchrlMtFcgeQ.text: I am SOOO excited that there is a location so close to my house now!!  I work close to the Hawthorne location and always find myself wanting Sabor when I am home!  This location is brand new, so there is a definite newness feel when you visit. Compared to other locations, it is not (yet) packed full of people and the food takes a little longer to come out (I assue this is because they are making food to order).  I could tell that the staff seemed a little overwhelmed, which lead to them being less friendly than they could have been but again, this all comes with the territory of being a brand new restaurant.   The shredded chicken is the best thing you can eat here- in a burrito, in a taco, on nachos- whatever floats your boat.  Their guac is also to die for- it is so creamy and is just perfection. My husband is obsessed with their nachos.  They are GIGANTIC and could probably feed a family of four easily (of course he finishes them off solo). I forsee a TON of visits in our future now that they are so close to home!!!  On a mom note, they have high chairs available and a kids menu that has a fair amount of options compared to other places.  Drink of choice is a smaller fountain drink, so if you need milk for your little one, bring your own.  My toddler was also losing his mind while we were there and they did not bat an eyelash or make us feel unwelcomed :)

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

EnbZx2kttZBvPyc-8BuV2w.text: Terrible. Probably one of the worse latin restaurants fast food places I have ever eaten at. Chipotles crushes this place which is sad.  Not sure where some of the rave reviews come from.  I rarely say this, but avoid at all cost.

y3g9yfsfZ6hq0f8PuwsrKg.text: I am a huge Sabor fan and am so excited to have a location in this area. I cam here for $1 Taco Tuesday and wow; they were more than generous with their chicken and beef fillings!! Authentic as always with cilantro and onion, these tacos are spot on. The nachos are the best in the city, not to mention the Arepa!! If you don't know what it is , it's a corn cake stuffed with good things like chicken and crumbled cheese, it's my families favorite thing on the menu.  Everyone was helpful and friendly, see you next time!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. $1 taco Tuesday!!

3ExgepDv-JAeCthOsVJb6A.text: nice collection of spicy salsa's  Good quantity will fill a lot of ppl fully.  Didn't forget to try their pink chips and pinapple harbenaro salsa

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Nice filling food.

j9uGn5rUFvt_1x5zXc5grg.text: Based on the good reviews,my husband and I had high hopes for this place but unfortunately it wasn't what we'd hoped.  Sabor offers a pleasant and clean atmosphere but the food could be much better.Before I start talking about whether the food is actually authentic,let's talk about whether it actually tastes good and if it's worth your money.  Again,I really wanted to love this place because I love tacos.Anyway,I've had authentic Mexican food in Mexico and if you know where to look in Charlotte,you'll find authentic Spanish food.Sabor is not the place for authentic Spanish food.The 3 times we visited,we ordered steak and chicken tacos,the protein bowl with ground beef and the gorditas.Each of those dishes was a let down.The meat is VERY dry and lacks flavor.The tortillas were not fully cooked and were still quite stiff.Its also overpriced.Especially considering it doesn't taste good.  As far as how authentic the food is? Not authentic at all.They play Spanish music but that's as authentic as it gets.Seriously,save your money and go to Tacos Nayarit which is a taco truck located behind the golf gas station in Fort Mill.They serve delicious,authentic,quality Spanish food and for a lower price if you can believe it! Thank me later.

YgaolB3C_oVHgM0GNTodjg.text: Food was sort of cold but I came in on taco tuesday and the rush was super busy. Good service the manager Ryan was very helpful. Ryan gave me a refund for cold tacos! Overall a an okay experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

MMUl1fEHQF7XLq8f00qz4w.text: This is a great place for fast Mexican street grill. I always get the carne asada fries. They also have a salsa bar. My only complaint is that unlike all their other locations in the Charlotte area, they do not offer free chips with a Yelp check in. So don't come here expecting it because they look at you as if you're stupid for asking. I also do not care for the seasoning that they put on their chips.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

06LM2Fv1Vf6ftjLjFmzupA.text: I have been to this location 3x now and it is definitely not the best. The first two times the service was slow. My party all received their meal way before I got mine. The last time I went I ordered the quinoa avocado bowl and the rice was so old/ hard and dried out. It pretty much had the texture of uncooked rice, I couldn't eat it.

Cd_oGt3RQ9OqIJJs5vtpAw.text: Was in Pineville, noticed the new Sabor and decided to stop in for lunch. I've been to a few of their other locations and they never disappoint. I ordered their Thursday special which was an arepa and empanada for $6 (great deal!) along with an order of guacamole and queso. Everything was delicious, guacamole was fresh and perfect, portions are huge, the queso wasn't my favorite but that's just a personal preference, I like it spicy. Restaurant and restroom were clean, all the staff were very friendly, and food came out quickly. Awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Inside chorizo empanada
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Thursday special, arepa and empanada
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Guacamole and queso

q_nXOzoY9stccxWmxe7TqA.text: Excellent service and food. The corn on the cob is a must try! You won't be disappointed!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Mmmmmm...corn on the cob......

LJf3yFJnbcYJ00xssgGqpg.text: Wow.  The size of the nachos was incredible.  I thought it would be somewhat small so I ordered a basic taco too, but the nachos itself is big enough to feed an even hungrier than normal appetite.  The taco was a bit bland so definitely add some salsa, but the nachos with added jalapenos was one of the best I've ever had.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Nachos
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Autentico

3D3IN91IJ_5_G1msrd5C9A.text: Ok folks. This is real authentic fare. After living in TX for 10 years I haven't found anything close on the east coast or south. My new go-to place. Specials for drinks daily.  The Gordita is a meal itself. Full of flavors and meat and beans. Empanadas of beef made fresh and flavorful.  Overall, great food and friendly service.

xq7awLek7g0VZQAcSWwFag.text: I'm sure I caught them on a bad night. First, there was no one at the register to take customer orders. If you're placing a to go order there isn't really anywhere to wait so many of us were sitting at tables with patrons who were dining in. Then, they called my name to say my order was ready but it wasn't.   Got home and was missing ingredients. Nonetheless, the food was still delicious. I had two tacos and it was supposed to be the Elotes Loco but they forgot the cojito cheese. =/   I'd try them again and probably dine in.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

uAN2I8RhrCVUirnsnT3Tdg.text: Walked in on a rainy day, greeted by Ryan! He explained the Monday special and was very engaging. Male cashier was super nice. Food came quick and hit the spot after a 7 hr drive from Florida! Great people, esp Ryan, and great food.I'll definitely be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Three Amigo Burrito..deliciousness bite by bite!

Tx_-_Hk7B0saFb4TE1nJYg.text: Tuesday's are the best clearly i mean taco Tuesdays plus theyre a dollar !!!! Now the dollar ones dont come wh much but hey its a dollar for crying out loud. I can't wait to have the Mexican corn on the cob ..that's not it's name but it looks really good.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Sauces
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

W-BZD0rNETxDHt7ofNSWjQ.text: Awesome service! I ordered the tofu burrito and the chef even added in sauteed veggies for me! Delicious and great service. I love authentic tasting Mexican food so I will definitely be back again. Thanks so much!  Vegans can eat here without a problem and the tofu protein option can be substituted for any protein on the menu! fresh ingredients!

pyzA-SK2dQ_PpNfoqN5zBA.text: Sadly this is hidden in a old Bi-Lo shopping center which use to be busy. I feel like they deserve more business. Taco Tuesday is always on point and they have good sauces to go with your selection. If you're not in the mood for a taco, get an arepa, nachos or taco salad. They even have beer here as well.

LQF2u9jYg9RihN8dAjO1ZA.text: Definitely see myself here at least once a week. Clean restaurant, friendly staff, and damn delicious tacos.  Today was Taco Tuesday, which means $1 tacos! I'll be honest, I like that they offer it, but they only do a couple of different proteins and limited styles. So even though I'm paying a bit more, I still got the Locos Al Pastor. Pork so good you wouldn't even think it's pork (sorry Pork lovers, I'm usually don't get excited about it). Outstanding fresh toppings piled generously on 2 authentic corn tortillas per taco.  The salsa bar is great as well. I've taken quite a liking to the Pineapple Habanero, but it's just a bit to spicy for me so I cut it with some of the mild salsa. It's been fresh and delightful every visit to Sabor.  Lee served me and Jeremy was behind the line today. Great service, I've been to the Sabor closest to my house and was real disappointed with the crew. Glad that this one really values it's customers.  Next time I'm getting one of those fancy margaritas! They have a selection of mixed drinks on the menu on the side wall so be sure to check it out.  Keep churning out those authentic tacos and I'll be a long-time customer!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Locos Al Pastor with Pineapple Habenero!
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

rsbfhk6znaFHQMyopFHbKw.text: Delicious food .... it just is... if you haven't been to a location yet - get there before the word gets out that the Pineville location is open.  We had a fish taco, one beef and one shredded chicken along with a shrimp power bowl with chips .  Everything was delicious! I recommend you try the salsa bar ... The pineapple salsa rocks ! But there are several there for you to choose from.   So excited that Sabor opened here and you can be sure it will soon be a crowded place to wait in line ... but don't you know I'll be there !  See ya in line !

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Beef taco and a shredded chicken taco
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Yummy fish taco
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Protein bowl featuring shrimp!

WpbrkBOn_e5pYhB-RX1JDg.text: Always on point and fresh and delicious! Epic protein bowl is the way to go! Tons of protein, black beans and any extra you want mixed in. Burritos are great as well. Moes and chipolte are a 6 hour dried out big mac compared to these folks.

ELf9u0q4B6kZNcEOrTzWUQ.text: Happened upon this location while running errands so I decided to stop in for dinner all by my lonesome.   The staff were all very nice, when they brought out my food, the runner brought me extra napkins and a fork so I wouldn't have to get up.  Epic protein bowl was delicious and very filling. But not totally overwhelming in size-- don't get me wrong, I couldn't quite finish it, but still.   A manager(?) asked me how I was doing, but otherwise I enjoyed the background music as I ate my meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Epic protein bowl and amigos Margarita
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. View from my corner seat

YI-LoOj1b4KmZASyfdFnug.text: Best dollar tacos around. Free salsa...what more could you want. Serves alcohol, but if you can get 5 tacos for $5, why would you even need a beer??

OgpR6Wi1YlLjm4hLy_d1eQ.text: Second time going to this location first time order was messed up tried to have them redeem themselves and it wasn't any better. Next time I'm in the city I'll stick to going to the uptown location.

j5agyDTG3LE1LlgDK9nWnQ.text: I have this place a 2nd try and I was very impressed!!! The empanadas were amazing and huge. I've had so many versions of empanadas and I admit, I was an empanada snob (sorry) but I admit the first time I came here which was close to the grand opening the recipe used went over board on the cheese. When I came tonight with some friends (they insisted) I was pleasantly surprised.   My fav is the beef but the chicken is a close runner up. I haven't tried the veg but will do so on my next visit. Sorry for the first bad review, you guys totally redeemed yourselves.  #YummyEmpanadas

IAWT2shB3y6bLk_skAtJ8A.text: I love Sabor! The 7th street one is my go to but I must say I might drive the distance for this one. First of all this one has more seating than the 7th street and NODA location, which I love since that is always a hassle. This location will also handle lines better since the line would be sectioned off unlike the other two I've been to. I had my go to supreme nachos. They made it just as great as the other locations; piled high and beautiful! The service was great ( I believe the manager rang us up and brought us our food, he did a great job) and the food was prepared quickly! They have outlets at the table like the others which I love! All around if you been to other sabors before you will definitely love this one!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

3O9srtkXkQVSDBvVyTB_Mg.text: Great food! Amazing Monday burrito and Tuesday taco deals. The restaurant is clean and the service is very friendly l.

tdodLPiTLmZOHWIja0j8fg.text: LOVED THIS! My friend recommended this spot hen I stopped into town, and it was great. Prices are great-drinks were amazing and food was awesome! I had to grab a mojito to go with my fish tacos and was NOT let down. Would definitely recommend to anyone in the Pineville area looking to grab a cheap bite to eat in an inviting sit down atmosphere. You get fats food prices, with the customer service experience of a nice, sit down restaurant. Well done!

TaYOOcPfHAzzJ5TzfybRdg.text: I discovered this place 4 business days ago, I have been there 4 business days in a row. Top notch flavor, top notch people, 100/100. Nuff said.

4QV_5XUnYJDsxrbUtCP6TQ.text: Plus and minuses here-good: food was excellent as as always! Bad-not sure if they were still in lunch confusing, but service from kitchen was slooooow. Several parties around us were inquiring about their food, plus wrong orders. Again just a bad day I hope?

uViI1IM92PIdrfAJ48e5CA.text: Wow, just wow.  I lived in Houston, TX. Years ago and have lamented the fact that I couldn't get any good food like that here in Charlotte.  I am so glad that I tried this place, but upset that I didn't try it sooner. I will, definitely, be coming back here frequently.  I decided to try the Tacos at this visit and got one of each of the Americanis, Authenticos, and the Locos as well as an empanada. All excellent.   With that said, let's get to the review:  Cleanliness: the eating are was spotless, the tables clean and everything was well maintained Service: everyone was pleasant, clean and friendly. A little sauce leaked onto my empanada, which was fine, but I definitely feel as if I said it wasn't, they would've made me another one.  Food: excellent, fresh, well cooked and packed with flavor, everything that would expect out of Latin food.   Overall: love this place and you should too!  Can't wait to come again.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Top: Tacos Authenticos, ground beef Left: Tacos Americanos, ground beef Right: Tacos Locos, chorizo and ground beef

xgG0IeeVmznVnabjy2B6PQ.text: The best tacos ive ever had love Taco Tuesday 1.00 tacos  yum .  I had 2 chicken n 2 beef they so messy makes it even better.  I ordered some Queso its was perfect an creamy n you get free chips since I ordered the medium size:)  I saw their nachos looked like enough for 4 yum .I cant wait again for taco tuesday get ur taco on   Update: I am not sure what is going on with this location but last week my Queso was clumpy an not good. I went back this week my queso was much better an I ordered the Empanada chicken where has this been its so good not greasy an lots of chicken inside. Now I had to ask someone to come an put out salsa cups for the salsa bar. It was their busy time an honestly he was just doing little things an looked like Micromanaging the staffFill the salsa bar add cups come on grrr However is a young man   he normally brings out food an is in the kitchen as well he is awesome an always has a smile on his face keep him please:)

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Empanada

pK6wf4K3Lh6ugOAPFJ3u3w.text: 5 star food, 5 star service. I've eaten here several times both dine in and take out. Management is super nice and accommodating from my experience, as is the staff.   Let's start with the food, amazing. I usually get the quesadilla loaded with chorizo and al pastor pork and it's incredible. Some of the best Latin food I've had.   Location and bathroom etc is all clean and tidy, the only complaint I have is I'm not a huge fan of their salsas; my meal doesn't come with chips anyway so it's not a big deal, but their salsas aren't for me. Also the parking in that lot is like nonexistent.   Seriously though their food and service is great. Always had a consistent experience and for that it's 5 stars.

evs2P9kKjCucBd6Qw2MDvg.text: First visit and I liked it. I had the daily special 3 amigo burrito and a drink for $6. Great deal as it is a Hugh burrito. You pick the protein of your liking, some do cost a little extra. But it is a very generous meal. My BF had a couple of empanadas which again we're very good and filling. They have 6 or 7 different salsas to pick from. So feel free to try some or all. They have a few outdoor tables with not much a view. Can't have everything I guess.  There are so many locations to choice so I promise there's got to be one close to you.    I want to try the tacos. Any suggestions?

vUjrt0DnhDfl72NykS7qoQ.text: Ate here about 9 months ago and was great, not tonight!  Steak burrito is all black bean!!!     $1.50 Casio was size of ketchup pack!!!!   Horrible.  Won't be back!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Cask, tiny!   Never get my money again!!!!!
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Steak burrito but looks like a black bean burrito!

b-HHJ2Po0zzWh9_dFD-OGQ.text: The layout is nice customer service was ok. The speed at getting our food was horrible because we had nothing complicated. It was a 20 minute wait for Arepa with chicken, ground beef empanada, guava empanada, and fish taco. The empanadas were burnt and I originally ordered chorizo. Not sure I will try them again. They were clean looking.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Burnt Guava empanada

oeRJgjxatVvgt04W9LorBg.text: Delicious fast Mexican food. Their guava empanada is amazing! Yes, sometimes you have to rave about dessert first! I ordered the empanada, Gordita, and chips. It was a ton of food for one person; but I somehow managed to eat most of it, it was that good! Sabor is a great place to go for lunch or a quick dinner. Warning, the food is a bit messy and not recommended to eat in a car.

CkQ9JXe7rtRcXQtJuxyCpQ.text: Latin street food in pineville. The last time I tried Sabor I had a great experience albeit at a different location. The one in pineville is a lot smaller than the one in fort mill but the menu and ambiance is the same. Staff were friendly and the facilities were clean. It is counter service as all sabors are. The food this time however wasn't as good. I decided to order the carne asada fries which I enjoyed the last time I visited. The "steak" in this had the same texture of, shape, and size (actually even a bit smaller) as crumbled sausage that you might get on a pizza at little caesars. This was unfortunate as the rest of the ingredients were quite good. I'll likely go back, but I'll try something else next time.

DmlmEPaagqgc1XVDLj0Idw.text: Having grown up in Arizona, you can't get any Truer Latin Hispanic food other than living in those countries itself. it's hard to find anywhere in Charlotte that has True Latin flavors. Many places around here seem to water and tone down or even omit many spices. The Carolinas don't seem to enjoy the same powerful flavors I am used to back home.   Damn it, Sabor gets it right!   The menu isn't very big but covers all the essentials with some good options. I was blown away to taste the actual ingredients and not some overly oiled or mashed up paste of food other places try to pass off as authentic. Handful of salsa options and great service.   Can't wait to come back here!

I-CjaiDd5WfYt2jGpPoJfA.text: Always consistent good food priced fair at every location. Great basic margaritas. Taco Tuesday best deal in town.

xu_URqZuv15e3OdfoTAcGg.text: I was a little dubious of going here since the area looks a little run down at the moment (lots of construction going on), but this ended up jump-starting me and my boyfriend's determination to eat at a Sabor weekly. The staff were super helpful and patient as I took forever to decide on what to get. The space is a little small, but we were able to get a table. The salsa here isn't very hot but is still pretty flavorful! This made for a very good mid-week dinner and we will definitely be back!

6Ro2ZmIQ71SJktYsVFdwxg.text: SO SO SOOOOO GOOD!! My family came for dinner tonight and loved everything. Super fresh, huge portions, great price, and super nice staff!!

97earDyyXZOnSrhu3MKsBw.text: The fish tacos and shrimp tacos are fantastic! The mojitos aren't half bad either! This is post workout hangout spot.

WlU86F2j2VjV2iTTovbA3Q.text: The food is great, but the service is excellent. We had a party of 7 and they took really good care of us. It felt like we were at a sit down restaurant as opposed to fast casual.

8b_r2c5hWW056EcJxIMB2Q.text: Well, actually I don't know where to start.   Ordered one Argentinian beef empanada to share, I ordered "carne asada fries" & husband a burrito 3 amigos. Two drinks.  Pros: Very clean and friendly staff. Cashier took our order and served us fast. Great atmosphere. Music on point. You don't need to yell!   Cons: we are from Argentina, so definitely, that was not an empanada. At least, Argentinian. It was ok though. But in Argentina we don't mix ground beef with cheese. (For example).  The burrito was ... meh. (Not flavorful, according to my husband). We were expecting some chips, that's why we got some sauces. But the burrito came alone...  My "carne asada", well... the steak was over cooked. A stone! So I only ate the cheese guacamole and fries.   Our expectations were higher. But actually we were dissatisfied. So, I think that for the price, I can eat better in another Latin fast food or even a restaurant.  Sorry guys, honestly, I know most of you, will say, I don't care if the "Argentinian empanadas" are Argentinian. But I felt disappointed. We left hungry.  So for us, it was just another Latin spot.   It was not the worst but not the best either.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. We didn&#39;t try the red mild sauce, however I can say the other one is a mix of ketchup and mayonnaise aka &#34;salsa golf&#34; in Argentina.
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Tres amigos, burrito. Meh
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Carne asada... steak over cooked.

7qUaActyCGHu3xP-9hvZoA.text: 2 stars mostly because of the really poor service. I've been to many of the Sabors and this one definitely has not been able to get its act together. There's almost NEVER a time you call them to place an order that you don't get a busy signal, or you  get put on hold...where they leave you hanging on and on and on. At least 3 times this last month I gave up holding and decided on another take out option instead. Come on Sabor Pineville. Hire more help if that's what the problem is!! I've almost completely given up on this Sabor.

71K6b7M5PqFe2FzobFvo-w.text: Really good food much better than chipotle,etc. I had a Gordita and a Sabor burrito. Definitely recommend. Order extra meat if you're really hungry.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

YQFwggdN_bVVgIeXWptQ2A.text: I was told that the empanadas here were legit and in fact, they are. I was here on a quiet Saturday afternoon after doing a too big food shop (Never shop hungry? Rule broken.). Short queue to place my order and I decided to hop around the menu a little.  One empanada with chicken. One "autentico" shredded chicken taco. And one fish taco. It did not take long and my food was brought over to the table.  Excellent presentation. The fish taco was a big pile of colorful shredded cabbage on top of tilapia. Very tangy, very tasty. A little messy.  The chicken taco took a little bit of the habanero pineapple salsa (HOT!) and was delicious. A good portion of soft shredded chicken. Quite drippy but delicious.  My final course, I dug into the empanada after it had cooled just a little bit. Nicely stuffed with chicken and cheese, it also came with a creamy sauce for dipping. Delicious.  A large meal, plenty of flavor, good food. Yum!  They also have beer specials which I might have had if I didn't have my "friend" with me.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Fresh empanada at Sabor
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Shredded chicken taco at Sabor
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Fish taco at Sabor

DZrmiqJ3mZoq0kpUKcjO0Q.text: So this fast casual food chain has very tasty food and I'm glad we went. The Three Amigo  Burrito was huge, hot, and delicious. Based on food alone this place is great.  The tables have charging ports. Novel idea!  There were no forks available so I made the best of it with a spoon. I asked for forks at the counter and the guy went looking but couldnt find any.  The tables were gross and there were chunks of food on the floor in several locations. Just eww. Looks like vomit.  The ladies' restroom was nasty.   The location was not busy on this particular Sunday afternoon so I think they could have at least pushed a broom.  Next time I'll try a different location.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Ordering station
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. Colorful wall!
Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States. View from the seats looking in.

r2J9sIDb_j7Qoqw7rWrDbQ.text: Let me first say that I love Sabor. I'm a regular on Tuesdays. I have no issues with Sabor. This location wasn't my favorite. I liked that they offered both grilled and shredded chicken - not all locations have grilled chicken. My margarita was good. My issue was the small extras. They were out of napkins and salsa cups. Took a LONG time to get my tacos. The grilled chicken was very dry. Other than that it wasn't too bad. It was busy as is normal on Tuesday. There wasn't enough seating - again, normal on a Tuesday. Overall, it's my least favorite location in the chain.

kNFOUVIM83BHdDH4yWWHjw.text: Great food and service! Great tacos and taco salad with quinoa. Convenient location in south charlotte!

aLjAx9HljbCTOXpI-yj8uw.text: Excellent, fast latin food - I can't get enough of the three amigos burrito.  It's got that meaty cheesy flavor that's so wonderful. $6 also on Monday's with a drink. Nice people and after 4 visits in 2 weeks, I'm a fan.  Tacos were good too. Very clean tasting.  Don't miss this place.  Pretty awesome treat.

JMuImyONiMAxj99et7fM2Q.text: INSANE tacos! We chose the americano tacos with quac on the side. Sabor never disappoints!!

W-pN6koo68oUSribviqG3g.text: My friends and I had a great lunch here today. All the food was tasty and good portions. Even the margarita was exceptional! We all agreed the common denominator was fresh ingredients.  There is even outdoor seating and multiple TVs . Daily food and drink specials.

ofPUBAIm3PeF8PovPxl2Kw.text: Fast casual tacos. Taco Tuesday for a $1 is a great deal but even at $3 every other day it is a real value. Pretty fast service. This is a great place to grab a quick lunch or dinner. This new location is a little hidden but worth finding. Still love the Hawthorne location best but you'll get a really good meal for the money at any of their locations.

cNg07lROEXu78CYmpi-E9g.text: I have been wanting to try this place, specifically the nachos. I ordered with refried beans and shredded chicken. Someone else had a platter of them in the dining room and they looked delicious but I made the mistake of taking them to go.  It was truly a ton of food, the guac was good but it was a mushy mess by the time I really started eating them and I couldn't make it past the first layer. I didn't care too much for the taste of the chicken but that could be because I was expecting more of the Mexican type flavors that I'm used to.

photos.caption: Photo of Sabor Latin Street Grill - Pineville - Pineville, NC, United States

pET1BXkyBRSyddoTedL7GA.text: Just finished eating here and enjoyed some tasty food!  I ordered the Dominic on a Diet, and it was the opposite of diet food.  The burrito is huge and so stuffed with chicken, I could only eat half. The cilantro lime yogurt sauce on it is delicious!  My husband ordered a ground beef taco, rice and a side of queso and chips. He enjoyed all of it.  The guacamole is super fresh and flavourful and the salsa bar had some great options. We saw several orders of nachos be delivered and they were huge!  We will definitely be coming back to try some of the other menu offerings and enjoy the attentive service.

O9WDcbcFOCbOTmTmjD4WUg.text: I like the food a lot at Sabor. I've been there twice and had the empanadas (great) and the fish tacos, tasty. Margarita was good, too much ice. Since it's really not a sit down restaurant, you'd expect the food to come out faster. It takes a while. Also, it depends on who is your cashier... tonight the service was pretty disappointing. Still, food is reliable and good.

-AGhHNltcUMd6cSqiNsjdw.text: Glad to see another location open! Now whatever side of town I'm on I can get a Sabor fix.  Great place clean and friendly. The owner or manager is a nice guy always making sure everything turned out good.  Just wish he wasn't a Duke fan lol but good guy! Will he back

7u-h5BbBKm16pOPu4DXNkA.text: Solid street Latin food. Quick, reasonable. Have a good meal every time! We love this spot

1OHcvZQ5rJxUmYa1rlMlZg.text: I've been here a few times since they opened in Pineville & I'm addicted to the nachos. Everything is so flavorful & fresh, super delicious.

QURL_gKw52YboIocr44RoA.text: Authentic tacos!!  Very delicious and great price on Tuesdays.

TYJ1rTRhTEm57rfHR2XI6w.text: I have been three times now, and I really enjoy the food here, empanadas, tacos, etc, have all been very tasty, sometimes a bit heavy on the cheese though. They also have some pretty good daily specials.   The service is fine, no one has ever been rude or unprofessional, however each of my three visits there has been an issue with the order. First time, burrito had under-cooked rice, second time forgot to bring us the drink we ordered, third time the price for the item I ordered was more than the listed menu price. None of the issues by themselves were that serious, but on the other hand each time I brought it to their attention, the staff did not do much to accommodate beyond a simple apology. If more concern for correcting order mistakes and customer satisfaction was shown, I would likely give 5 stars.

dmrLAyFdSgBuCLA_zTmeUQ.text: Dollar taco Tuesdays! Can't beat it. Love their selection of different salsas. Friendly staff & clean environment. Definitely would recommend. Everything i have tried so far has been good. Brand new location.

tq3YPTOnNsq7N5T7tk0dvg.text: My wife and I droped in to check it out. Street food is just what you get and plenty of it. The flavor profile is ok. Nacho's were plentiful, queso was very bland, chip were fine. When the waiter brought out the nacho's, we couldn't believe how big it was.    They offer several salsa's which were ok but something was off. The other sauce they had was Russian Dressing called something else. Since we are vegetarians, we were excited they offered grilled vegetable options, the black beans were plentiful, the vegetables were cut so small you could not identify or taste them.    Wife had empanada, filled with super bland  cheese with very little flavor. Grilled veggy's cut so small she could not see or taste them. Price point very reasonsble, however, not our cup of tea.

KiL_NBNbmHCCjvQZVcADLA.text: Great service with helpful staff. The empanadas and arepas we're delicious.  Loved the salsa bar!

zuKg_QwoZ_kQwRmvPkK0Uw.text: Really enjoyed their street tacos.  This restaurant filled a gap in The Mexican offerings in this area. They might work on the friendliness of the gal at the register but she didn't detract from the great food.

NZaVEHylHQ8fcAbFlpIjtg.text: Had really high hopes for this place (considering all the other positive reviews). Walked in on a Sunday afternoon with the hubby. We ordered 2 Elote Locos, 1 Stuffed Chicken Arepa and 1 Steak Quesadilla. Here are my thoughts on each: the Elote Locos - Corn had absolutely not flavor (maybe they should add a little salt to the water, that may help a bit), I've had this at other restaurants and it's been amazing but unfortunately here not even the Cotija cheese gave it flavor, quite odd. The arepa - it was ok,  the outside was crispy and tasty, chicken was juicy (but again no flavor) what saves this is the "rosada" sauce it comes with, which I assume is simply ketchup/mayo combo. Now on to the Steak Quesadilla, this absolutely has to be the worst I've ever had. It was 2 flour tortillas with some tasteless melted (mozzarella?) cheese and a few tiny flecks of overcooked, dry as hell steak. The fact you charge $7.25 for THAT is absolute highway robbery and what audacity, you have to pay an EXTRA $1.25 to get some peppers and onions added??? Shouldn't the steak be cooked in some peppers, onions, tomatoes, cilantro, etc??? I can't say anything about the rest of the menu items but based on what we ate I'd say I'm never going back. I found these items to be completely bland and tasteless definitely NOT worth the money!

qSUbR5DtqjhF9Otqc3RGrw.text: First time. Tried empanadas, authentic tacos, guacamole and chips, and a quesadilla. The quesadilla was ok. Everything else was bland and uninteresting. I had high hopes but was disappointed. I'll give it another try just in case I caught them on a bad night.

JivMiY1DgvSQzg2AEd0UvQ.text: Fast Mexican food with limited service.  Food was good and inexpensive. Nothing special to write home about.

QWW8CbmBVLk9y68UasIqpA.text: Had the epic protein bowl with shredded chicken and chips and queso ...it was ok,nothing spectacular,queso was a bit lumpy,chips are very greasy.
